title: GelesFinance
author: GelesFinance
created_time: May 11, 2022, 06:24:16 AMLast edit: July 04, 2022, 02:15:25 PM by GelesFinance
content: The main goal of Geles Finance platform development is to implement a new global digital economic environment that eliminates intermediaries and provides automation, security, asset divisibility, transaction transparency and fee compensation for all types of financial operations. The use of blockchain and tokenization technology opens up additional profit opportunities for both investors and users of the Geles Finance platform.MVP is available now https://geles.finance/mvpGELES is a Financial Platform providing:üîπ Asset tokenizationüîπ Fee compensation (Up to 50%)üîπ Intermediaries free operations700 000 GLE Special Lottery: https://twitter.com/GelesFinance/status/1538890388123308034Bounty campaign https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5398141.0GelesFinance website: www.geles.financeWhitepaper: http://geles.finance/Geles_WP_1.0.0.pdfOnepage paper: https://geles.finance/Geles_OnePager.pdfTechnical paper: http://geles.finance/Technicalpaper_v1.0.0.pdfTwitter: www.twitter.com/GelesFinanceTelegram: www.t.me/Geles_ChatGithub: www.github.com/GelesFinance/GelesBscan:www.bscscan.com/token/0x239F017D510276BA7De0f0ef110C68CC843b7072The mission of the GELES project is to create a better financial platform with its own economic system that enables:üîµ Businesses - to maximize the benefits of commerce, setting new standards of trading culture and increasing social responsibility to the community;üîµ Investors - to be assured of profits from the purchase, storage and use of GLE tokens and experience all the benefits of participating in the development of the world's best financial platform;üîµ Users - to get maximum enjoyment from purchases and trades;üîµ Partners - to build profitable, reliable and permanent relationships;üîµ Community - to constantly develop, communicating with the team of like-minded people and receive a worthy assessment of personal contribution to the development of GELES platform.The Geles platform offers a set of solutions to create a new world of digital economy, the main ones being:1Ô∏è‚É£ Tokenization of any assets;2Ô∏è‚É£ Fast transactions across any network;3Ô∏è‚É£ Flexible asset management system;4Ô∏è‚É£ Elimination of intermediaries from any financial activity;5Ô∏è‚É£ Transaction fee compensation;6Ô∏è‚É£ Guarantor service to secure transactions;7Ô∏è‚É£ Exchange of any assets according to the Everything-for-everything principle;8Ô∏è‚É£ Collateral and credit mechanisms;9Ô∏è‚É£Investment tools;üîü A set of solutions for creating custom business models and financial instruments.We see Geles and its associated tokenization protocols as a further development of the classic global economic system using blockchain, smart contracts and artificial neural networks. Geles team is confident that the solutions offered by the platform will be adopted at government levels in the foreseeable future and will become the standard for the new digital world of the economy without intermediaries.GLE token is BEP-20 tokenToken distribution:http://geles.finance/0001.jpgGLE Token purpose:1) The token is used on the Geles platform and gives users access to specialized sections and exclusive interaction rights. 2) GLE is used to manage tokenized assets.3) The token entitles users to create a custom financial product.4) Transaction fees are reimbursed in the GLE token. 5) The token is used to encourage active actions by users of the platform.6) The token is part of the business model of the Geles financial platform.7) The token is a mandatory deposit when using the platform's guarantor service.8 ) Token is used to pay for additional services of the platform and acts as a unit of account. 9) Token enables direct interaction between platform users. 10) Limited token issue of 12,500,000 units. ICO infohttp://geles.finance/ICO.jpgBounty infohttp://geles.finance/0003.jpg

comments.author: asyakashi
comments.body: It can be concluded that this project is a financial, payment and management project that makes it easy for users to transact, store, and manage their money in the application. I'm sure a project like this will attract a lot of people because it is very relevant to the purpose of cryptocurrency, it's just that because there are many projects with similar concepts I suggest you have to show the advantages of your project compared to other projects to be able to compete.

comments.author: GelesFinance
comments.body: Quote from: asyakashi on May 20, 2022, 10:20:33 AMIt can be concluded that this project is a financial, payment and management project that makes it easy for users to transact, store, and manage their money in the application. I'm sure a project like this will attract a lot of people because it is very relevant to the purpose of cryptocurrency, it's just that because there are many projects with similar concepts I suggest you have to show the advantages of your project compared to other projects to be able to compete.Hello Asyakashi!Thank you for your opinion, interest and high mark. We've done a Competitive Analysis that can be found in White Paper (Chapter 5.4, page 36 https://geles.finance/Geles_WP_1.0.0.pdf) of already operating platforms. The main advantage of Geles project is to implement a uniform solution for economic relations and provide it to global society. The Geles key benefits are:1) Completely intermediaries free deals with any assets;2) Unique tokenization algorithms;3) First time developed solutions for evaluation of any kind of assets;4) Never used before trade method "Everything-for-everything";5) Up to 50% comission fee compensation at any network;6) Unlimited banking and financial tools;7) Users ability to create custom economic instruments and products.
